description.diamond-pearl:
The user delivers a
life-endangering head
butt at full power.
The user also takes
terrible damage.

The user delivers a
life-endangering head
butt at full power.
The user also takes
terrible damage.

life-endangering
attack at full power.

The user also takes terrible damage.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/2 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.shortEffect: User receives 1/2 the damage inflicted in recoil.
